help.description: Shows the manual page for every command

play.description: Plays a YouTube link in the voice channel (Video / Playlist)

shuffle.description: Plays a YouTube link in the voice channel (Video / Playlist)

queue.description: Displays the current queue of songs

np.description: Shows the details of the currently playing song

leave.description: Disconnects the bot from the voice channel, and clears the playlist

volume.description: Adjusts the volume of the song

radio.description: Controls the radio functions of the bot

info.description: Controls the radio functions of the bot
